description: 微博：CLARE-MUSIC 工作请私信，感谢关注。Midtempo、Experimental、Techno、House

songs.lyrics:
Flashing lights
闪烁的灯光
Intertwined
交织在一起
I met you at just the wrong time
我恰好在错误的时间遇见了你
Lost in your eyes
迷失在你的眼中
Question the right
质疑正确的
thing to do in my mind
在我心中该做的事情
It’d be smart to cut it off
切断它才是明智的
To not reply when u want to talk
当你想说话时不要回复
Sayits harmless but I’m warning you,
说这无害但我警告你，
Warning you
警告你
I’ll pick up your call
我会接你的电话
But I don’t wanna fall now
但我现在不想陷入
Into too deep
陷入太深
Into too deep
陷入太深
can’t give you my all
不能把我的所有都给你
Cause I know after all now
因为我毕竟现在知道了
where It’d lead
它会通向哪里
Where It’d l lead
它会通向哪里
I could come over maybe/baby
我可以过来/宝贝
But not to sleep
但不是睡觉
I’ll pick up your call
我会接你的电话
Cause you’re all that I want
因为你就是我想要的一切
But you’re, not what I need
但你不是我需要的
Ooo ooo ooo
哦哦哦哦哦
Not what I need 
Not what I need 
Not what I need 
不是我需要的
Wide awake
完全清醒
So much at stake
风险太大
Should hang up cause it’s getting late
应该挂断电话因为已经很晚了
I’m Scared I’ll say
我害怕我会说
Something that may
也许会
Make you think I’m feeling a different way
让你觉得我感觉不一样
It’d be great if I was ready
如果我准备好了就好了
But now it's getting so messy
但现在情况变得如此混乱
Said it’s harmless but I warned you
说这无害但我警告过你
I Warned you
我警告过你
I’ll pick up your call
我会接你的电话
But I don’t wanna fall now
但我现在不想陷入
Into too deep
陷入太深
Into too deep
陷入太深
can’t give you my all
不能把我的所有都给你
Cause I know after all now
因为我毕竟现在知道了
where It’d lead
它会通向哪里
Where It’d l lead
它会通向哪里
I could come over maybe/baby
我也许可以过来/宝贝
But not to sleep
但不是去睡觉
I’ll pick up your call
我会接你的电话
Cause you’re all that I want
因为你就是我想要的一切
But you’re, not what I need
但你不是我需要的

作词 : Alek Jenssen
 作曲 : CLARE
 编曲 : CLARE
Been on the same
9-5 job lately I feel numb
What I became
I’m not proud of I’m just too far gone
I need something different
Give me a distraction
Something magnificent
Give me a disruption
Oh oh Oh oh
Stuck in the same routine
Oh oh Oh oh
Stuck in the same routine
What would I give
To be alive
What would I give
To feel alive
I’d give it for
A brand new start
I’d give my all
To stay alive
I’d give it for
A different plot
I’d give my all
To stay alive
Drop
I know how this ends
Day ‘til night, my life’s predictable
As the day begins
Work ‘til late
it’s unacceptable
I need something different
Give me a distraction
Something magnificent
Give me a disruption
Oh oh Oh oh
Stuck in the same routine
Oh oh Oh oh
Stuck in the same routine
What would I give
To be alive
What would I give
To feel alive
I’d give it for
A brand new start
I’d give my all
To stay alive
I’d give it for
A different plot
I’d give my all
To stay alive
 翻译 : 苏怿/Juke. Blezkovcii

High dive into frozen waves where the past comes back to life
Fight fear for the selfish pain, it was worth it every time
Hold still right before we crash
Cause we both know how this ends
A clock ticks 'til it breaks your glass
And I drown in you again
'Cause you are the piece of me I wish I didn't need
Chasing relentlessly, still fight and I don't know why
If our love is tragedy, why are you my remedy?
If our love's insanity, why are you my clarity?
If our love is tragedy, why are you my remedy?
If our love's insanity, why are you my clarity?
Walk on through a red parade and refuse to make amends
It cuts deep through our ground
And makes us forget all common sense
Don't speak as I try to leave
'Cause we both know what we'll choose
If you pull then I'll push too deep
And I'll fall right back to you
'Cause you are the piece of me I wish I didn't need
Chasing relentlessly, still fight and I don't know why
If our love is tragedy, why are you my remedy?
If our love's insanity, why are you my clarity?
Why are you my clarity?
Why are you my clarity?
Why are you my clarity?
